title: Acoustic-based approach for micro-leakage detection and localization in water supply pipelines
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00686G, Paper
Cuimin Feng, Jiancong Zhao, Qiangsan Ran, Mengchao Qu, Zixiao Guo
Improving the accuracy of acoustic detection techniques is crucial, especially in scenarios with low pipeline pressures (≤0.2 MPa) and small leak apertures (≤2 mm), where micro-leakage detection poses challenges.
